channel.title: Cache can't be downloaded - retrying in 5-4
channel.description: For some reason, when people download my client and click run client, the client runs and the client comes up but when the cache is being downloaded it says "Cache can't be downloaded - retrying in 5-4-3-2-1 and then it does the same thing from 10 and then 15, etc. I know my server is online. How do I fix this? Thx ;D

item.title: Cache can't be downloaded - retrying in 5-4
item.dc:creator: @Nom_Nom Nom Nom
item.description:
@Nom_Nom wrote:

Oh wait. I didn’t read the first line properly. Sounds like there is a problem with the code. Like, where they download the cache from. I use windows 7 and my client works perfect. So, it must be the code.

Read full topic
